sentences.sContent: Can deglaciation trigger earthquakes in N. America?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can deglaciation trigger earthquakes in N. America?
sentences.sCn: 冰川消退能触发北美洲的地震吗?。

sentences.sContent: Little is known about climatic conditions in the tropics during the last glacial period and the deglaciation that followed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Little is known about climatic conditions in the tropics during the last glacial period and the deglaciation that followed.
sentences.sCn: 人们对最后一次冰期热带的气候条件以及随后发生的冰川消退知之甚少。
